description:
Лаптоп
Дисплеј:15.6" (39.6cm)
Резолуција:(1920 x 1080) FHD , micro-edge, anti-glare, 250 nits, 45% NTSC
Процесор:Intel® Core™ i3-1215U (up to 4.4 GHz with Intel® Turbo Boost Technology, 10 MB L3 cache, 6 cores, 8 threads)
Графика:Intel® UHD Graphics
RAM меморија: 8 GB DDR4-3200 MHz RAM (1 x 8 GB)
Диск (Storage): 256 GB PCIe® NVMe™ M.2 SSD
Без оперативен систем (FreeDOS)
Камера:HP True Vision 720p HD camera with temporal noise reduction and integrated dual array digital microphones
Wi-Fi: 802.11a/b/g/n/ac
Bluetooth® 4.2
Порти:
1 USB Type-C® 5Gbps signaling rate (supports data transfer only and does not support charging or external monitors)
2 USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate
1 AC smart pin
1 HDMI 1.4b
1 headphone/microphone combo
Power:45 W Smart AC power adapter
Батерија:3-cell, 41 Wh Li-ion
